D.A.R.P.A. IS FUNDING AN IMPLANTABLE CHIP ...LTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY - Part 2 of 4In NEWS1875, we reported that leading edge scientists have created the most sophisticated implantable chip ever, the kind of chip that can control mankind in just the way that "Mark of the Beast" implantable chip foresees in Revelation 13:16-18. If you have not read this first article, on the subject, we encourage you to stop now and do so, in preparation for this Part 2. In Part 1, we reported that a Professor Kevin Warwick of England is the world's preeminent scientist engaged in developing future uses for this chip. Let us go to his web site now to briefly discuss the science behind the chip. "The interface to Professor Warwickâ€™s nervous system was a micro electrode array consisting of 100 individual electrodes implanted in the median nerve of the left arm. A 25-channel neural signal amplifier amplifies the signals from each electrode by a factor of 5000 and filters signals with corner frequencies of 250Hz and 7.5KHz. The amplified and filtered electrode signals are then delivered to the neural signal processor where they are digitized at 30,000 samples/second/electrode and scanned online for neural spike events." ["The Neural Interface", Kevin Warwick]The important factor here is that this implantable chip is designed to be placed in the key nerve areas of the body! Sometime in the future, a wide range of human emotions and feelings will be permanently stored in a government computer, ready to be sent out via RF (Radio Frequency) to an individual or to a whole group of people. These people will feel exactly what the government wants them to feel -- all of the people within range of the RF signal. In this way, an entire city may be made to feel the same feeling or emotion! For example, an entire city may be tranquilized at once, if everyone in the city had been previously implanted with this MMEA chip!Can you imagine how effectively the government could take guns away from a population previously implanted with this chip? All government officials would have to do is to anesthetize everyone in the city with a specific RF signal. With everyone in the city asleep -- for days if necessary -- government officials could leisurely drive up to home after home to gather all the guns and cart them away. Conversely, if the leaders and/or citizens of a particular town or city were proving too troublesome to the government, an RF signal could be sent out that sent everyone into writhing, torturous pain! The citizens could be left in extreme pain for such a long time, they could be easily induced to stop their opposition and start cooperating!The possibilities of government control are seemingly endless! This implantable chip simply offers the most incredible degree of control and threat of control the world has ever seen. But, this is exactly the kind of control this passage in Revelation 13 implies, just as we detailed in Part 1.http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875b.cfm (2 of 7)12/15/2003 6:22:07 PM

FUNDING As we shall very shortly detail, the future dictatorial arm of the United States Government -- Homeland Security -- is pouring heavy amounts of dollars through Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency, [D.A.R.P.A.] into this project. Homeland Security was created in the immediate aftermath of the 9/11 attacks, and is designed to be the future Gestapo Police State apparatus that shall repress every American citizen, no matter if the citizen is friend or foe of the government. Let us first quickly examine this office so you can realize how dangerous it is that such a government entity is pouring many millions of dollars into an implantable chip that has obvious Antichrist connotations. We have previously written some important articles on Homeland Security, so let us review these first:* NEWS1691 - "PRESIDENT BUSH AUTHORIZES SUMMARY EXECUTION OF "U.S. ENEMIES" BOTH WITHIN AND WITHOUT THE UNITED STATES. ReutersATTORNEY GENERAL ASHCROFT PLANS CONCENTRATION CAMPS FOR U.S. CITIZENS THAT ARE DEEMED "ENEMIES" -- L.A. POLICE STATE, U.S.A., TAKES SHAPE" "... the current Homeland Security Act is not a good thing for the country. It is, as crafted, deeply flawed, dangerous and a cure worse than the disease, as New York Times columnist William Safire showed in his recent column, 'You are a suspect' ... It is nothing short of a prescription for a full-scale police state in the USA." ["Police State, U.S.A.", by Joseph Farah, WorldNetDaily, 11/19/2002]We show a detailed Flow of Authority Chart of Organization for Homeland Security and encourage you to study it carefully. You will note that Tom Ridge, operating with tremendous authority, controls each of the Cabinet positions which used to report directly to the President. Now, Tom Ridge is their boss, and he reports directly to the President, a change of monumental proportions. Even the CIA, Department of Justice, and http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875b.cfm (3 of 7)12/15/2003 6:22:07 PM

D.A.R.P.A. IS FUNDING AN IMPLANTABLE CHIP ...LTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY - Part 2 of 4Department of Defense report to Ridge. In the guise of "protecting" our liberties, our leaders are in the process of taking them away, with the vast majority of Americans totally unaware of what is really occurring! In the Old Testament, as Israel drew closer to the "edge of the sword" judgment God had prepared for them at the hands of Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon, the people became increasingly spiritually darkened and apathetic; a close study of the Major and Minor Prophets seems to demonstrate that God was causing a progressively increasing spiritual blindness to fall upon virtually the entire population, to the point where they could not see what was about to occur.America seems to be in the same predicament today, even to many sincere, genuinely saved pastors, teachers, and Bible professors! Can God's judgment be far off? But, now, the question of the hour is: "Why would an authoritarian Police State organization so very interested in strongly funding the most sophisticated human implantable chip that can tightly control every person on earth precisely the manner in which Bible prophecy foresees."?Now, let us examine some of the more important private and educational research facilities working on MMEA and BMI who admit they are receiving funding from Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency, [D.A.R.P.A.]Neural Engineering Laboratory"NEL Brain-Machine Interface (BMI) research is one component of a large research contract from DARPA titled "Human Augmentation Through Advanced Brain-Machine Interface Systems". ["Brain Machine Interface Systems", Neural Engineering Laboratory, Department of Biomedical Engineering, Research, http://nelab.engin.umich.edu/Global/Content.aspx?ModMenuID=1 ]Brown University, Providence, Rhode Island"Research Interests: Our research is at the interface of biological, chemical, and physical sciences. We utilize X-ray diffraction techniques to determine the atomic structures of biological macromolecules and use these results for medical and computational applications. The projects in the Yeh lab falls broadly under three general categories: crystal structure studies, nanoelectronic detection and signal propagation, and computational / algorithmic development.I. Three Dimensional Crystal Structure Studies: Our laboratory focuses on elucidating biological function of macromolecules by detailed structural, molecular, and biochemical studies ...II. Computational Biology: Atomic structures provide not only provide great insight into function but also for pragmatic applications in medicine and pharmacology ... III. Nanoelectronic detection and sensing: Another area of research in the Yeh lab is on the design and integration of biological sensors with nanoelectronic circuitry, using a diverse array of biomolecules and based on the development of innovative linkers between the biological systems and the nanodevices. This is a collaborative project that brings together scientists in physics, engineering, and biomolecular areas to formulate and design new materials for ultrasensitive detection and signal propagation. Our goals are to harness the http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875b.cfm (4 of 7)12/15/2003 6:22:07 PM

["WELCOME TO THE YEH LAB!", Brown University, http://www.brown.edu/Research/Yeh_Lab/]Duke UniversityNEWS BRIEF: "Neurobiologist uses brain to restore mobility", The Chronicle Online, The Independent Daily At Duke University, by Liana WylerSeptember 30, 2003."... Dr. Miguel Nicolelis ... is making far larger strides toward finding a way to restore motor function in paralyzed patients. Co-director of the Center for Neuroengineering, professor of neurobiology and philanthropist, Nicolelis is realizing another dream and in the process, turning heads in the international scientific community. 'My dream is to understand how large brain sequences work to create motor functions and use that information to clinically treat paralysis,' said Nicolelis."Most of the researchers today firmly believe that they are pursuing a technology that will benefit mankind, and resolutely refuse to even consider that their discoveries and practical advances might be used for any dark, sinister purpose. You will see this reality a little later in this article. Now, let us return to see the impact of the DARPA funding."Nicolelis and his research team were awarded an unprecedented $26 million grant from the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) in 2002 to design a brain-machine interface program that could test whether neuroprosthetic devices can be used to restore motor-function in paralysis victims. Next week ... the fledgling Public Library of Science Journal ... will debut exciting preliminary clinical data on neuroprosthetic devices that can be controlled simply by thinking about it. Last year, Nicolelis's research team found that monkeys can incorporate a robot arm into their thoughts and control the robot."This line of research is the essence of the DARPA interest; they want a device that can interact with the brain -- Brain-Machine Interface, or BMI -- that can be used to tightly control the person into whom the chip is implanted; whether this technology could ever create thoughts and/or control all thoughts and belief structures remains to be seen. We are positive DARPA can't wait to discover the answer to that question, as well.Incredible Benefits"The implications of Nicolelis's research is far-reaching. There are currently over 200,000 people who are paralyzed and each year, 10,000 more will become paralyzed. The possibility of regaining mobility is revolutionary. 'This is about trying to create something that doesn't exist', said Nicolelis. 'I'm a physician by training and to me, the possibility of restoring motor function by creating an exoskeleton robot--or even bypassing the lesion in the spinal chord--is incredible'." Once again, we see that researchers are totally obsessed with the benefits to people who are paralyzed, possibly for life. When this technology becomes more widely accepted and fully understood, these benefits will be trumpeted globally and very few brave souls will ever think of the dark lining in this silver cloud. This article then proceeds to this dark lining, but notice that, before any of the less than agreeable elements of this http://cuttingedge.org/news/n1875b.cfm (5 of 7)12/15/2003 6:22:07 PM

D.A.R.P.A. IS FUNDING AN IMPLANTABLE CHIP ...LTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY - Part 2 of 4technology are even discussed, they are dismissed when the journalist calls them "rumor mill". Listen:"Hannah Hoag, an intern at Nature wrote a sensational feature article in June, contriving DARPA's goals as going beyond trying to rehabilitate paralyzed veterans and intending to create devices 'to enhance normal human function' and 'allow images to be relayed direct to the brains of military personnel' similar to The Matrix. Defending his research, Nicolelis pointed to the fact that her 'more sinister interpretation would not be possible' to realize in the near future, and that his contract with DARPA is not classified information."No, of course, the good doctor, Nicolelis, would not be dealing with classified information, because his research is very above board and public. What DARPA will likely do is to take his cutting-edge advances and turn to their own scientists to achieve the true goal, which Hannah Hoag has probably accurately described. DARPA is very interested in planting thoughts into the minds of their victims, not only military personnel, but large populations. New Age author, Bill Cooper, wrote about the goal of the Illuminati to control the entire masses of people throughout the world. Listen:"With these three inventions under their direction, those in positions of power strongly suspected that it was possible for them to control the whole world with the push of a button." ["Behold A Pale Horse", Bill Cooper, p. 38]DARPA seems to be counting on the probability that this "Brain-Machine Interface" implantable chip system will allow them to "control the whole world with the push of a button."Therefore, you can see the hideous future when the very frightening future Police State apparatus is so interested in a human implantable chip which will tightly control each individual on earth in precisely the same manner as the Bible foretells. Any survivor of a Communist police state would instantly become alarmed at the implications of this chip and the fact that the very agency designed from the beginning to be repressive is the agency funding the research.The Bible is unclear as to the timing of the Mark of the Beast; however, it seems like the timing would vary from perhaps a year into the Tribulation to the Mid-Point of the Tribulation period. Therefore, from the moment Antichrist arises, to the time when the Mark of the Beast is forced upon the peoples of the world, it seems that at least one year and perhaps as many as 3 1/2 years would lapse before the chip would be implemented. With total scientific knowledge doubling every 18 - 24 months, this time lapse is significant. This lapse would mean that the development of the chip would not have to be 100% ready when Antichrist arose. But, clearly, this M.M.E.A. - MULTIPLE MICRO ELECTRODE ARRAY - implantable chip seems to be the only chip which fulfills every single demand which the prophecy demands of the "Mark of the Beast". Let us close with this prophecy:"And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads: 17 And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name." [Rev 13:16-17]Are you spiritually ready? Is your family? Are you adequately protecting your loved ones?
